{"id":565935598,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1633397562,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/565935598/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isv(char c){\n        if(c=='a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u'){\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int l=0,r=s.size()-1;\n        while(r>l){\n            while(!isv(s[l])) l++;\n            while(!isv(s[r])) r--;\n            if(r<l) break;\n            swap(s[l],s[r]);\n            l++;\n            r--;\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
